OOC: I knew they were coming, but my army is busy.

Megatron looked calmly into a view screen showing the two Powermaster
brothers on the outside of the ship. Megatron then smiled broadly.
"These Decepticons are incompetent." he said to himself, recalling back
to the time he recruited them on Cybertron millions of years ago.
"Firestrike, Bodicons, there are intruders outside, dispose of them." he
said calmly.
